items.label: 539fc9b1ec4f024d2f53f43c
items.description:
Additional Info:
*AVAILABILITY: Single-phase service under this rate is furnished through one meter for all domestic purposes in individual single private residences or single apartments. Incidental commercial use (not exceeding 20% of the total energy use) on the same premises is permitted under this rate. Not available to customers with capacity requirements in excess of fifteen (15) kilowatts.

*APARTMENTS OR MULTIPLE DWELLINGS: When separate metering of individual occupancy is not practical, service may be furnished through a single meter. In this instance, the Minimum Charge will be applied to each occupancy connected to the meter.

*Following Charges apply:
 MINIMUM CHARGE $5.00 per monthly billing period (Includes 30 Kwh's).
 ENERGY CHARGE  13.10 cents per kilowatt-hour
 RENEWABLE ENERGY TRUST .0005 cents per Kilowatt hour
 (adjustment) 

* As provided in the Light Plant's "Purchased Power Cost Adjustment and PASNY Adjustment Clause." PURCHASED POWER COST ADJUSTMENT & PASNY CREDIT are applicable to all kilowatt-hours billed under this rate.
items.name: RESIDENTIAL SERVICES
